downloadTitle: Designing high-quality distributed Cloud-Native applications on Azure: An introduction between theory and practice
downloadDescription: This e-book covers the latest trends in application development and how to best take advantage of the latest services such as Azure Container Apps, Azure Load Testing, and Azure Chaos to test and scale your apps.

downloadFile.name: Ebook - Designing high-quality distributed Cloud-Native applications on Azure - V1.1.pdf
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/9/a/8/9a8a312d-3d0e-4bbe-a9f7-511fb2ff54b5/Ebook - Designing high-quality distributed Cloud-Native applications on Azure - V1.1.pdf

detailsSection: This e-book covers the latest trends in application development and how to best take advantage of the latest services such as Azure Container Apps, Azure Load Testing, and Azure Chaos to test and scale your apps. It also includes a comprehensive look at the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework and how to apply it to your projects. Topics such as architecture patterns, choice of cloud services, availability, resilience, and security are discussed in detail. Moreover, the e-book does not just cover the theory but also provides a complete implementation of an example case
